document_data.mainbody:
jord was one of the twelve moons of Garden in Realmspace.
Like most of Gardens moons, Fjord was larger than its parent, but there was confusion about its size and shape. Astronomical records indicated that it was spherical, yet its dimensions were listed as  by , indicating rather an ellipsoid. Its rocky surface had no atmosphere.
Fjord was once a prosperous mining colony, but it had been abandoned by the later 14 century DR.
